name: Richard C. BANEY, Appellant v. William F. WARD, Chairman and Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole, Appellees

parties: Richard C. BANEY, Appellant v. William F. WARD, Chairman and Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of March, 2004, the above captioned appeal is quashed as untimely pursuant to 42 Pa.C.S. § 5571 and Pa. R.A.P. 105(b).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
843 A.2d 1223
Richard C. BANEY, Appellant v. William F. WARD, Chairman and Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 4, 2004.
